name: neptune
description: A free and open source GTD system

scripts.dev-migrate:latest: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run server yarn knex migrate:latest
scripts.dev-migrate:rollback: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml run server yarn knex migrate:rollback
scripts.prod-migrate:latest: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml run server yarn knex migrate:latest
scripts.prod-migrate:rollback: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml run server yarn knex migrate:rollback
